channel.title: The REmake Of RuneScape Part 2
channel.description:
I have been working on the REmake of RuneScape its going well but I need help
Things Im working on: -Highscores -Perfect PKing [[Includes NON multi pk zones]] -Anti mass [[When you click twice between the time span it ignores]] -Adding NPCs -Adding Minigames
I need voulenteers to post me coords of NPCS like in real RuneScape I would really Apreeciate it -I am also looking for people to make mini games with because im on my own , Java
NPC voulenteers: - -
Mini Game helpers: - -
I will contact any helpers trough PM and give them my email
